MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA9 postcode area of Prestwick, affecting properties in Carradale Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.13pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to onsite difficulties locating an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.15pm on Friday 20th November 2020.
